Desc.entry: A registered charity that provides a neutral meeting place where a parent of a separated family can have contact with their child/children. One of the parents must have a connection with Sheffield or South Yorkshire. Run as part of a national network and staffed by a paid co-ordinator and specially trained volunteers. Other family members welcome, if accepted by resident parent. Sibling contact welcome, if a neutral person is available to supervise contact. Self referrals are possible. The centre can be used as a neutral handover point.
